Construct maps with jpmesh

Shinya Uryu

2019-05-10

Source: vignettes/articles/plots.Rmd
plots.Rmd
library(jpmesh)
library(sf)
df_polys <- 
  meshcode_set(mesh_size = "80km") %>% 
  jpmesh::export_meshes()

base

df_polys %>% 
  st_geometry() %>% 
  plot()

ggplot2

# Use develop version (2.2.1.9000)
library(ggplot2)
ggplot() + 
  geom_sf(data = df_polys, fill = NA) +
  geom_text(data = cbind(
  mesh = df_polys$meshcode,
  df_polys$geometry %>% 
  st_centroid() %>% 
  st_coordinates() %>% 
    as.data.frame()),
    aes(X, Y, label = mesh), 
    size = 1.2) +
  coord_sf(datum = NA) +
  theme_void()

leaflet

library(leaflet)
leaflet() %>% 
  addTiles() %>% 
  addPolygons(data = df_polys)

plotly
